title: may 5: Cinco de Mayo
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the holiday Cinco de Mayo, and how it’s origins are a little different than people usually guess. Afterwards, Maia talks about an Avril Lavigne hit. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
